description:
The Make Local collection brings together Opendesk designs that have been tweaked specially for the New York Maker Faire 2015. Read more about our collaboration with ShopBot and 100k Garages [on the blog](https://www.opendesk.cc/blog/make-local). 

During the faire, visitors will be able to view the designs at the Sketchup stand and get them made in Shopbot's area. Each piece has been designed as an 'Air-Fix' kit fitting onto a small board, easy to carry home and make.

A CNC version of a chair, designed and made by Bill’s uncle when he was 3 years old. Now 63, the design has be remastered for digital fabrication. The originals were made from 1x12 pine boards and nailed together.  Bill’s version bolts together for easy assembly and strength. They can be used as tables or chairs and can be handed down to each new generation. One of the originals still sits proudly in Bill’s home. 

*New York Maker Faire Pricing:* 

**$40.80** 
+ sales tax

**If you can’t make it to the faire this year you can still download the designs [here](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/make-local/60-year-chair/make-it-yourself) for a limited time only!**
name: 60 Year Chair
